name: Fifth Day
description: Fifth Day: A Cold Winter is a first-person, Minecraft-style Sandbox RPG, with horror elements from the 7 Days to Die and A Quiet Place franchise. The game is set in a post-apocalyptic future after a bio-engineered disease has wiped out a large majority of the human population, and in its wake, given rise to strange mutations of creatures that have developed a taste for human flesh. As the Protagonist, you must protect your outpost, scavenge for resources, survive the nightly hordes, and hope that help will one day arrive.
